1:
CIRCULAR  NO.   33 /  2002 
 
 
SUBJECT:- Carriage of Wooden Staff by Religious Heads as a Dart of hand 
baggage  
It has been brought to notice of this Bureau that the security staff posted at different 
points of the airport and cabin crew in some flights are not allowing the holy wooden 
staff being carried by some religious heads. In this connection instructions issued by this 
Bureau vide Circular of even no. Dated 18.10.2000 (copy enclosed)  may be strictly 
adhered to by all concerned. 
(R.K. Singh) 
Addl   Commissioner  of  Security (CA) 
 
Ref. No. CAS-7 (8)/84-DIV-1     dated   22.10.2002
